search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for RingCentral (ringcentral.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for RingCentral can be found here: [https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Flexible Plans & Pricing Starts at $20/month - RingCentral

extracted_content.content:

===============

 [Skip to main content](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html#maincontent)

RingCentral Plans & Pricing
---------------------------

  

Business Phone

Contact Center

Video

Events

Conversation Intelligence

Business Phone

*   Business Phone
    
*   Contact Center
    
*   Video
    
*   Events
    
*   Conversation Intelligence
    

RingEX
------

TM[✦](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html#ex-general-disclaimers)

Experience effortless productivity with the #1 business communications platform. AI-powered calls, messages, and meetings unified across wherever work happens.

Save up to 28% by paying annually

Save up to 33% by paying annually

 

Monthly

Annually

Number of users

1-56-100100+

 ![Image 5](https://www.ringcentral.com/content/dam/rc-www/en_us/images/content/office/plansandpricing/ai-icon.svg)

Now including AI Assistant features in every plan — from transcribing calls and capturing notes to drafting and translating texts and chats. [Learn More](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html#assistant)

  

##### 

Core

Start communicating effectively with reliable phone, HD video, and messaging essentials for small organizations.

### $20

$30

/user/month [\*](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html#general-disclaimers "*") paid annually

Buy now

Try free

[View demo](https://www.ringcentral.com/view_demo.html "View demo")

[Contact sales](https://www.ringcentral.com/feedback/sales-contact.html "Contact sales")

[Contact sales](https://www.ringcentral.com/feedback/sales-contact.html "Contact sales")

*   **Included in plan**
    
    Unlimited domestic calling [\*](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html#general-disclaimers "*")
    
    Enjoy **unlimited calling within the US and Canada**, with less than 6 minutes of downtime annually. You can also choose from affordable international plans tailored to your business needs. Terms and conditions apply.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Business SMS and MMS
    
    RingCentral offers **carrier-compliant SMS and MMS** that is optimized for deliverability. Many customers use RingCentral SMS to reach customers faster and enhance their experiences by sending notifications, alerts, reminders, confirmations, and sales promos, and more.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Call menu (IVR)
    
    **IVR (Interactive Voice Response):** This feature provides a responsive call menu, allowing callers to use their telephone keypad or voice responses to navigate and perform actions automatically, reducing the workload on your staff.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    HD video meetings (100 participants)
    
    Host HD video meetings with up to 100 interactive participants.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Google, Microsoft integrations
    
    **Google pre-built integration:  
    **•Access and manage RingCentral features directly from Google Chrome.  
    •Schedule and join video meetings using Google Calendar.  
    •View and manage communications history (calls, texts, voicemails) from Chrome.  
    •Click-to-call and click-to-SMS from any web page.  
    •Merge contacts for streamlined communication.
    
    **Microsoft Teams pre-built integration:  
    **•Use one number for all communication needs within Teams (phone, fax, SMS).  
    •Access telephony features across Teams, desk phones, and mobile devices.  
    •Manage advanced call controls like multi-way calling and call transfer.  
    •Send business SMS and faxes directly from Teams.  
    •Sync presence status between Microsoft Teams and RingCentral for seamless availability updates.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Single sign-on
    
    Use your company credentials to automatically log in to your RingCentral account.
    
    **RingCentral Single Sign-On (SSO)** leverages the security of your own network to provide your users with a safe way to log in to RingCentral automatically. The feature integrates easily with most Identity Providers, making it quick and straightforward to set up your entire company.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Shared voicemail
    
    Access and manage your voicemails across devices — online, desktop, or mobile. Preview messages in text, listen, delete, forward, or return calls with ease. View caller details, timestamp, and message duration to prioritize your responses.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Real-time Quality of Service (QoS) Analytics
    
    **Quality-of-Service (QoS) Reporting:** Monitor your system's performance with powerful QoS reports. Quickly identify issues through detailed metrics, alerts, and quality scores, and access real-time, interactive reports covering your network, apps, and deskphones.  
    **Call Logs:** Track your communication with detailed call logs. View caller names, numbers or extensions dialed, along with the time, date, and duration of each call.  
    **Audit Trail:** Maintain security and transparency with Audit Trail. Easily search your account history and changes made to RingCentral app admin settings.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Developer platform, custom integrations, access to APIs
    
    Build custom workflows and applications with our open APIs, SDKs, and widgets. With a suite of powerful APIs for voice, SMS/ MMS, team messaging, video, fax, data, and configuration - you have the power to completely revolutionize the way your business communicates.
    
*   ![Image 6](https://www.ringcentral.com/content/dam/rc-www/en_us/images/content/office/plansandpricing/ai.svg)
    
    AI Assistant
    
    *   Transcribes calls and meetings in real-time
        
        RingCentral instantly transcribes your calls and meetings, capturing every word. For 1:1 calls, you’ll receive a complete transcript between you and the other speaker. For meetings, full transcripts from all speakers are available, ensuring no detail is missed. Transcripts can be easily downloaded after each interaction.
        
    *   Summarizes video meeting recordings
        
        RingCentral simplifies your post-meeting recap with concise summaries, key highlights, organized chapters, and keyword tagging. Quickly reference essential details and moments from your meeting recordings without sifting through the entire playback.
        
        Please note: RingCentral AI Assistant may sometimes misinterpret details; double-check important information for accuracy.
        

##### 

Advanced

Most Popular

Elevate customer experiences with automation, superior service tools, and multi-site management solutions.

### $25

$35

/user/month [\*](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html#general-disclaimers "*") paid annually

Buy now

Try free

[View demo](https://www.ringcentral.com/view_demo.html "View demo")

[Contact sales](https://www.ringcentral.com/feedback/sales-contact.html "Contact sales")

[Contact sales](https://www.ringcentral.com/feedback/sales-contact.html "Contact sales")

Everything in Core **PLUS**:

*   **Included in plan**
    
    Auto call recording
    
    **Auto call recording:**  
    •Record all inbound and outbound calls for individuals or only inbound for departments.  
    •Playback and download recordings whenever needed, or easily disable recording when not required.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Advanced call monitoring and handling
    
    **Advanced call monitoring and handling:**  
    •Allows managers or agents to listen to calls discreetly in real-time.  
    •Whisper coaching or feedback directly to your team during calls without the customer hearing.  
    •Join the conversation or take over the call if needed.  
    •Route calls dynamically to specific extensions or numbers based on criteria such as maximum wait time or caller overflow.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Connect multiple sites
    
    Efficiently manage multiple sites from one account. Customize each location with its own caller ID, call handling rules, and management settings. Enjoy site-specific features like auto-receptionist and more to streamline operations at each location.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    HD video meetings (100 participants)
    
    Host HD video meetings with up to 100 interactive participants.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Unlimited internet fax
    
    **Fax anywhere:** Use any device to send and receive faxes online—no extra hardware needed. Fax worldwide to any machine. Integrates with Dropbox and Google Drive for easy file access.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    CRM integrations (Salesforce, Hubspot, and 300+ apps)
    
    Connect seamlessly with CRMs and business apps like HubSpot, Salesforce and Zendesk to streamline workflows and reduce app switching.
    
    **Integrate with key CRMs to streamline workflows such as:**  
    •Automatically logging calls  
    •Getting detailed screen pop-ups with a complete view of the caller   
    •Make calls or send texts directly in your CRM apps  
    ...and so much more
    
    Unlock full access to RingCentral's entire suite of apps supporting productivity, automation, analytics, vertical-specific needs, and more in the [App Gallery](https://www.ringcentral.com/apps/).
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Adoption and usage analytics with 6 months of storage
    
    Get visibility on how your communications drive your business, from anywhere, on any device. See what’s happening in real-time with interactive reports or explore historical trends and patterns.
    
    **Adoption & usage (A&U) analytics** gives visibility into usage and adoption patterns of the RingCentral products across your organization. You can gain intelligent insights such as how the products are being used at across different orgs and sites, how often someone is using RingCentral, which locations may need more training, and device preferences.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Archiver for cloud storage back-up
    
    With RingCentral Archiver, you can move both historical and current records, starting from the time you set up, to the cloud, immediately resolving storage limitations and freeing up resources. Archive call recordings, voicemails, text messages, faxes, and video meetings to your Box, Smarsh, Dropbox™, or Google Drive™accounts or to an SFTP server, and securely search and retrieve past records anytime.
    
    RingCentral Archiver is an automatic and convenient archival solution within the RingCentral admin portal.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Custom roles and permissions
    
    Streamline user setup by assigning predefined roles during account creation. Roles encapsulate necessary permissions, ensuring consistent access rights across the organization. Utilize bulk upload features to efficiently update and assign roles, minimizing errors and saving time.
    
*   ![Image 7](https://www.ringcentral.com/content/dam/rc-www/en_us/images/content/office/plansandpricing/ai.svg)
    
    AI Assistant also:
    
    *   Takes call notes in real-time
        
        RingCentral provides a summarized version of your call, available right after the call ends. You can edit, share, and even sync these notes with your call history for easy reference.
        
        Please note: RingCentral AI Assistant may sometimes misinterpret details; double-check important information for accuracy.
        
    *   Captures call action items
        
        RingCentral captures key action items discussed during your call, helping you track next steps effortlessly.
        
        Please note: RingCentral AI Assistant may sometimes misinterpret details; double-check important information for accuracy.
        

##### 

Ultra

Leverage extensive functionality with added storage, analytics, and advanced tools for large organizations.

### $35

$45

/user/month [\*](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html#general-disclaimers "*") paid annually

Buy now

Try free

[View demo](https://www.ringcentral.com/view_demo.html "View demo")

[Contact sales](https://www.ringcentral.com/feedback/sales-contact.html "Contact sales")

[Contact sales](https://www.ringcentral.com/feedback/sales-contact.html "Contact sales")

Everything in Advanced **PLUS**:

*   **Included in plan**
    
    Customizable analytics and reporting
    
    Create custom reports easily with user-friendly interfaces and templates — no special skills needed.
    
    Keep informed with automated updates, including report subscriptions and real-time alerts, sent directly to your inbox.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    12 months of analytics and reporting history
    
    Access up to 12 months of data history to help make informed, data-driven decisions. Option to add-on storage for 24 or 36 months.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    HD video meetings (200 participants)
    
    Host HD video meetings with up to 200 interactive participants.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Device analytics and alerts
    
    RingCentral's device status reports provide IT administrators with information on the status of rooms and deskphones online and offline.
    
    **Overview of Device Status:** Easily check the status of all rooms and deskphones, both online and offline, organized by location. This helps you keep an eye on your equipment everywhere, all at once.
    
    **Interactive Map Tool:** Use a dynamic map to see and manage how many devices are online or offline. You can hover to get quick info, click for detailed issues, and focus in on specific areas to find and fix problems.
    
    **Alerts:** Get instant alerts about the status of your devices to quickly handle any issues. You can customize these alerts to fit what your organization needs, making sure you’re always in control and informed.
    
*   **Included in plan**
    
    Unlimited storage for files and recordings [\*\*](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/plansandpricing.html#general-disclaimers "**")
    
    Store an unlimited\* amount of documents, spreadsheets, presentation files, contracts, invoices, images, videos, and recordings.
    
    \*Retention period applies.
    
*   ![Image 8](https://www.ringcentral.com/content/dam/rc-www/en_us/images/content/office/plansandpricing/ai.svg)
    
    AI Assistant also:
    
    *   Writes and drafts SMS and team chats
        
        RingCentral AI Assistant can help you quickly write messages for SMS and team chats. Simply give it a prompt, and it will draft the message for you. You can also adjust the tone, improve wording, and change the length with just a few clicks for clear communication.
        
    *   Translates copy for SMS and team chats
        
        Easily translate your SMS and chat messages into different languages, including Spanish, German, French, Simplified Chinese, and Italian. RingCentral AI Assistant makes it easy to connect with people around the world.
        

Are you a school or university? Find out about dedicated pricing.

[Learn more](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/industry-solutions/education-cloud-phone-systems.html "Learn more")

### Frequently asked questions

  

#### Is RingEX free to use? How long is RingEX free Trial?

Yes. Free trial is available to new subscribers only. During the 14-day free trial, you will receive support for up to 20 phone lines. You can use any combination of RingCentral desktop phones (up to 2 devices during free trial) and the RingCentral app. The RingCentral app is compatible with Windows, MacOS, Android and iOS operating systems.

The entire suite of RingEX features, including voice, auto attendant, online meetings, team messaging, fax and conferencing are available during the trial. SMS is not available for trial use.

Any free trial hardware must be returned within 21 days of trial cancellation in order to avoid hardware charges.

#### Can I make unlimited calls with my RingCentral phone number?

Yes, you can make unlimited VoIP calls and conference calls using the RingCentral app to anyone in your organization. For external calls, you get unlimited phone calls within the US and Canada. For other international calls, RingCentral offers international calling plans and bundles at an affordable price.

#### What’s the best plan if I’m replacing an on-premise PBX system across multiple sites, branch locations, and global regions?

There are 3 key administrative and 2 analytics features in the Advanced and Ultra packages that help organizations realize the benefits of consolidating and managing their communications in the cloud.  Key administrative features include cost center management, multi-support admin and management and custom roles and permissions to control administrative functions.  Analytics features include adoption analytics and Business Analytics Essentials providing key insights with ongoing usage.

#### What apps does RingCentral integrate with?

RingCentral has over 330+ integrations across 200+ companies and leading business platforms to improve productivity, streamline communication within Customer Relationship Management (CRM) applications, automate application workflows and improve customer support. In addition to prebuilt applications integrations in the [App Gallery](https://www.ringcentral.com/apps/), RingCentral provides a suite of powerful [APIs](https://developers.ringcentral.com/api-products) for voice, SMS/MMS, team messaging, video, fax, data management and system configuration. [Learn more](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/integrations/overview.html).

#### How do you integrate with Microsoft Teams?

RingCentral provides Microsoft Teams customers with business calling to help them expand their global reach, integrate flawless employee and customer experiences, and connect the apps they depend on. RingCentral offers the most complete phone system with the richest set of integrated capabilities for Microsoft Teams. 

You’ll also get the broadest and deepest set of pre-built app integrations to plug in your phone system to all the different apps your business runs on - like Salesforce, Hubspot, Zendesk, ServiceNow, and many more. Additionally, IT and business analytics unlock insights and simplify troubleshooting - wherever your teams are located. RingCentral provides phone service that is 99.999% reliable, cost effective, and designed to meet even the most advanced business phone needs. Flexible deployment options ensure that you can deliver an experience that balances business needs, end user demands, and an exceptional customer experience.

#### Do you have any special pricing or packages for Education customers?

RingCentral Education Essentials™ and RingCentral Education Standard™ are designed to provide flexible solutions for the hybrid or virtual classroom, district, or campus. The RingCentral Education™ products help students, educators, and administrators connect over message, phone, and video all through a single, unified application.

RingCentral Education Essentials is designed for schools of any size-- from small charter schools to large public universities-- providing a simple and easy way for teachers and administrators to use phone and message solutions. The cloud-based system makes it easy to manage calls and voicemails on any device — and is complete with local numbers, extensions, call delegation, call screening, and visual voicemail. 

RingCentral Education Standard includes all the phone, messaging, and video capabilities needed to run an effective hybrid classroom with technology to help you engage with students (above the age of 16), parents, faculty, vendors, and other staff.

Information about K-12 schools' usage of RingCentral’s video conferencing feature in accordance with their FERPA or COPPA requirements is available [here](https://www.ringcentral.com/legal/childrens-privacy-notice-school-parental-notification.html).

Click [here](https://www.ringcentral.com/office/industry-solutions/education-cloud-phone-systems.html) to learn more about these packages.

#### What global compliance certifications does RingCentral have?

Our third-party attestations, certifications and adherence to global laws and compliance regulations speak to our commitment to data security. RingCentral is built on a secure cloud platform with a robust portfolio of security and compliance certifications, as well as compliance with global regulations, including HITRUST, GDPR, PCI, HIPAA and others.

You can view all of the existing global certifications and documentation at the [RingCentral Compliance Site](https://www.ringcentral.com/trust-center/compliance.html).  For additional resources detailing our information security, privacy and reliability, visit the [RingCentral Trust Center](https://www.ringcentral.com/trust-center.html).  

### Important details and disclaimers

 

RingCentral MVP is now RingEX. All references to “RingCentral MVP,” whether in terms of service, advertising, or product descriptions, mean “RingEX.”

*   Free trial is only available to new subscribers. Trial is limited to a maximum of five users and two desktop phones. Any free trial hardware must be returned within 21 days of trial cancellation in order to avoid hardware charges. SMS is not available for trial use.
    
    Acceptable [Use](https://www.ringcentral.com/legal/acceptable-use-policy.html) policies apply on all plans.
    
    Enhanced Business SMS is subject to our [SMS/MMS content policies](https://www.ringcentral.com/legal/sms-mms-content-policies.html) including volume and frequency limitations and the [Acceptable Use Policy](https://www.ringcentral.com/legal/acceptable-use-policy.html). Automated, high volume, or marketing SMS is available at an additional cost, as RingCentral High Volume SMS.
    
    Phone rental available only with multi-year contract.
    
    Professional implementations for two users and above.
    
    Other [taxes and fees](https://www.ringcentral.com/legal.html) such as the Federal Universal Service Recovery Fee, E911 Service Fee, Compliance and Administrative Cost Recovery Fee, 911 Fee, and State and Local Taxes, may apply. See Taxes & Fees for more information.
    
    Additional toll-free minutes available for purchase.
    
    International calls will be charged at the current rates published in our international rates table. Calls to international toll-free numbers will be charged per minute, based on the country’s rate.
    
    Mobile User extensions should not be used for making and receiving phone calls. While adding a Mobile User extension is free, if a Mobile User extension is used to make or receive phone calls in a given month, you will be charged that month for that Mobile User extension at the same rate per month as you are charged for Digital Lines.
    
    Unlimited phone calls are limited to US and CA markets only.
    
    Discount is for one year for Webinar 500 only, with a 1 year commitment.  After 1 year pricing reverts to $75 per host per month or the then current retail price.
    
    Available in US; International availability in H1 2025. SMS availability in US only.
    
*   Excludes video recording. [Storage retention period applies](https://support.ringcentral.com/mvp/admin/company-account-settings/ringcentral-data-retention-policies.html).
    
*   subject to availability
    

 

    ![Image 21: RingEX AI Assistant capabilities including call recap and text translation](https://www.ringcentral.com/content/dam/rc-www/en_us/images/content/office/plansandpricing/Popup_desktop-mobile-jpg-rendition.webp)

### RingCentral AI Assistant

 ![Image 22](https://www.ringcentral.com/content/dam/rc-www/en_us/images/content/office/plansandpricing/icon.svg)

Say goodbye to note-taking with accurate transcriptions, summaries, and action items — no recording required.
